title: Demon's Revenge
description: The demon's been unleashed and is hell bent on eradicating her host by any means possible.Alone and afraid, Kaleah fights against the darkness intent on claiming her soul, because if she fails, there's no telling the destruction she'll cause. War looms on the horizon, and with her home, loved ones and very soul ripped from her, Kaleah will stop at nothing to make things right, even if it requires sacrificing herself. Fate has come full circle, and this time, she's ready to die.
author: J.R.    White
